_header: Herod that was both wild and wood
Subjects: carols, of the Innocents; Holy Innocents
_description: A carol for Innocents’ Day — four quatrains and four-line burden: ‘Worcepe we this holy day / That all innocentis for vs pray’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Herode þat was bothe wylde & wodeFul muche he shadde of
                    cristen blode…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…By the prayer of thy moder godeBryng vus to blysse þat
                    lastith ay
